> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
>

<b>Signature:</b>

## Exceptions

[ErrorCode.InvalidConfiguration](./teamsfx.errorcode.invalidconfiguration.md) when client id, client secret or tenant id is not found in config.

[ErrorCode.RuntimeNotSupported](./teamsfx.errorcode.runtimenotsupported.md) when runtime is nodeJS.

## Remarks

Can only be used in server side code.
